description:
crypto/x509: add support for parsing and verifying DSA signatures
(DSA with SHA1, DSA with SHA256). Cleanup getSignatureFromOID
function.

messages.text:
Hello agl@chromium.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
LGTM. I'll leave a little while before landing to let others take a look if they wish.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ca3f8ce83f2b ***

    crypto/x509: add support for parsing and verifying DSA signatures
(DSA with SHA1, DSA with SHA256). Cleanup getSignatureFromOID
function.

CC=golang-dev
